segments.text: I ’ m glad you could make it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s my job . What can I help you with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think a pipe burst in my apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In what room is this pipe ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ ll find the pipe in my bathroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did the pipe start leaking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s been leaking for a couple of days now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will need to tear down that wall to fix that pipe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just want the problem taken care of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I will begin working on it now , if you ’ d like .
segments.speaker: S2
